description:
- Papakha: Brown "A cylindrical fur hat often worn by people in the far north regions."
*You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Fashion Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
 - Fur Bolero: Wine "A casual outdoor outfit featuring a short, faux fur jacket."
 - Kid's Bolero: Wine "A casual outdoor outfit for kids featuring a short, faux fur jacket."
 *You can buy it at any time in the game shop( Clothing Store in Castle St. ) when you purchase it.
name: Fur Bolero Set: Wine
